comments:
Mik,
The VE doesn't yet support this type of code pattern but you shouldn't be
getting a NullPointerException. I'll take a look at it.
Does this prevent your visual class from coming up in the Visual Editor?
Also... could you please create an attachment that includes your java source
code (please NO confidential code) so I can debug it. Thanks...

Gili & Sri, 
I'm not sure why but the fCC is null. Need to take a look at this statement:
	fCC.eAdapters().add(refAdapter);
in ContainerAddDecoderHelper.adaptToCompositionModel

BTW... to recreate this problem on the latest code (HEAD 1.1),
create a class extending JPanel, in the initialize method add the statement:
   this.add(new JPanel());
and then move the cursor just after JParel() and hit enter as if you are going
to add a method to the inner class JPanel. This will cause the NPE.

VE will now support <>.add(new Foo()) with no problems... It will not support
inner classes.  Note also, that the GUI does not supports the drag/drop of this
instance from one container to the other.
